sentences.en: A single mosquito can infect a large number of people.
sentences.cn: 一只蚊子就能传染很多人。

sentences.en: In recent decades, mosquito vectors of chikungunya have spread to Europe and America.
sentences.cn: 最近几十年，基孔肯雅热的蚊子媒介已传播到欧洲和美洲。

sentences.en: In a common itch like a mosquito bite, cells in the skin release a chemical called histamine.
sentences.cn: 在常见的瘙痒中，比如蚊虫叮咬，皮肤细胞会释放一种叫做组胺的化学物质。
